content: This is something I got over the net. Some of you might have seen this already but this is my first time seeing it. I haven't verified the stats but I figured it would be fun to look at anyway. Doctors vs Gunowners Doctors (A) The number of physicians in the U.S. is 700,000. (B) Accidental deaths caused by Physicians per year are 120,000. (C) Accidental deaths per physician is 0.171. Statistics courtesy of U.S. Dept of Health and Human Services. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Now think about this: Guns (A) The number of gun owners in the U..S. Is 80,000,000. (Yes, that's 80 million) (B) The number of accidental gun deaths Per year, all age groups, is 1,500. (C) The number of accidental deaths Per gun owner is .000188. Statistics courtesy of FBI. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> So, statistically, doctors are approximately 9,000 times more dangerous than gun owners. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Remember, 'Guns don't kill people, doctors do.' >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> FACT: NOT EVERYONE HAS A GUN, BUT ALMOST EVERYONE HAS AT LEAST ONE DOCTOR. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Please alert your friends to this alarming threat. We must ban doctors before this gets completely out of hand!!!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Out of concern for the public at large, I withheld the statistics on Lawyers For fear the shock would cause people to panic and seek medical attention!

title: Doctors vs Gun Owners

content: Apples and oranges. I had my gallbladder removed recently. It never occured to me to have a gun owner do it. Nothing against gun owners. I want a doctor. But if the doctor is a gun collector, that's fine. And how many lives have been saved by gun owners compared to doctors? It's a fair question,Thud357L . Back to apples and oranges. Apples make a great cider but orange juice goes better with vodka. That's a screwdriver. And that brings up another thing. Why is it there are no other coctails named after hand tools. You can get a screwdriver but no pliers or wrenches. You can't order a "ball peen" even if you want to get hammered!

content: Nice try, Thud. The actual total of gun deaths in the US is well over 30,000/year - you only gave "accidential" gun deaths. As for "physcian deaths"; while some are, indeed due to malpractice, there are a great many that would require the Lord Himself to intervene in order for the patient to survive. The fact of the matter is that in today's society, no one accepts "God's will" or "I've done all things humanly possible." So, doctors get sued for malpractice when a baby is born with birth defects, someone has a lethal motor-cycle accident and wasn't wearing a helmet, over-doses and blows their liver, has a heart attack but is in such bad shape doesn't survive, etc. It's always the doctor's fault for not being able to do G-d's (or, in actuality, the patient's) job. So, don't compare doctors' work to guns, nitwit. A 2 year-old can accidently shoot his brother with a gun but he can't do the brain surgery that might save his life.

The fact of the matter is that in today's society, no one accepts "God's will" or "I've done all things humanly possible." So, doctors get sued for malpractice when a baby is born with birth defects, someone has a lethal motor-cycle accident and wasn't wearing a helmet, over-doses and blows their liver, has a heart attack but is in such bad shape doesn't survive, etc. It's always the doctor's fault for not being able to do G-d's (or, in actuality, the patient's) job. Equating conservatives with fascists- what BS. Yeah. Well, take the time to read about how Fascism gained prominence in Europe, and maybe you won't think it's such b.s. Or, maybe you won't take that time so you can continue to cloak yourself in denial fueled by ignorance. Fascists are typically anti-socialist and anti-liberal. Hitler was a fascist (Germans preferred to call it Nazism). He said "The main plank in our program is to abolish the liberal concept of the individual and the Marxist concept of humanity, and to substitute for them the Volk community, rooted in the soil and united by the bond of its common blood." You'll also find Mussolini saying basically the same kinds of things.

(Yes, that's 80 million) (B) The number of accidental gun deaths Per year, all age groups, is 1,500. (C) The number of accidental deaths Per gun owner is .000188. Statistics courtesy of FBI. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> So, statistically, doctors are approximately 9,000 times more dangerous than gun owners. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Remember, 'Guns don't kill people, doctors do.' >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> FACT: NOT EVERYONE HAS A GUN, BUT ALMOST EVERYONE HAS AT LEAST ONE DOCTOR. >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Please alert your friends to this alarming threat. We must ban doctors before this gets completely out of hand!!!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> Out of concern for the public at large, I withheld the statistics on Lawyers For fear the shock would cause people to panic and seek medical attention!

content: Apples and oranges. I had my gallbladder removed recently. It never occured to me to have a gun owner do it. Nothing against gun owners. I want a doctor. But if the doctor is a gun collector, that's fine. And how many lives have been saved by gun owners compared to doctors? It's a fair question,Thud357L . Back to apples and oranges. Apples make a great cider but orange juice goes better with vodka. That's a screwdriver. And that brings up another thing. Why is it there are no other coctails named after hand tools. You can get a screwdriver but no pliers or wrenches. You can't order a "ball peen" even if you want to get hammered!

content: Nice try, Thud. The actual total of gun deaths in the US is well over 30,000/year - you only gave "accidential" gun deaths. As for "physcian deaths"; while some are, indeed due to malpractice, there are a great many that would require the Lord Himself to intervene in order for the patient to survive. The fact of the matter is that in today's society, no one accepts "God's will" or "I've done all things humanly possible." So, doctors get sued for malpractice when a baby is born with birth defects, someone has a lethal motor-cycle accident and wasn't wearing a helmet, over-doses and blows their liver, has a heart attack but is in such bad shape doesn't survive, etc. It's always the doctor's fault for not being able to do G-d's (or, in actuality, the patient's) job. So, don't compare doctors' work to guns, nitwit. A 2 year-old can accidently shoot his brother with a gun but he can't do the brain surgery that might save his life.

The fact of the matter is that in today's society, no one accepts "God's will" or "I've done all things humanly possible." So, doctors get sued for malpractice when a baby is born with birth defects, someone has a lethal motor-cycle accident and wasn't wearing a helmet, over-doses and blows their liver, has a heart attack but is in such bad shape doesn't survive, etc. It's always the doctor's fault for not being able to do G-d's (or, in actuality, the patient's) job. You'll also find Mussolini saying basically the same kinds of things.
